name: Fatal Flap
description:
Fatal Flap is a minimalist, 2D, arcade adventure in which only those with the best reflexes will survive! Play the classic endless and see how long you can last! You can unlock Challenge Modes for a faster, tougher, gameplay. But of course... watch out for danger on the way!

Features:
- Addictive endless arcade gameplay!
- 75 levels and 15 challenges to unlock
- 20 skins and characters to collect
- Vibrant graphics and original soundtrack
